constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 148 (Friday, August 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MOORE of Utah:
H.R. 5066.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 to Provide for the common defense and
general welfare of the United States; Regulate commerce; and
Make all laws which shall be necessary and proper for
carrying into execution Congress's other powers as provided
under that Article.
[Page H4343]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: Afghanistan Accountability Act
